Using Ripe

ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.80441166 0.90308789 0.52265108 0.86443757 0.32066987 0.46303602
#>  [7] 0.26549567 0.17503787 0.57938877 0.44318950 0.24704819 0.07692229
#> [13] 0.58919682 0.65189057 0.03485405 0.53095185 0.05938430 0.56122575
#> [19] 0.47419683 0.64596238
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.43081233 0.41476781 0.67225001 0.06347112 0.05310190 0.05180974
#>  [7] 0.20964471 0.62805054 0.62391820 0.75858310 0.60150463 0.83605736
#> [13] 0.10560837 0.21451638 0.40364816 0.84796984 0.94642007 0.95247516
#> [19] 0.15742702 0.63420919

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.64376798 0.73674604 0.84552407 0.32338491 0.37346772 0.39093495
#>  [7] 0.05773703 0.88177806 0.44900284 0.12548302
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.86292609 0.65054987 0.50794985 0.31734992 0.03525209 0.49384397
#>  [7] 0.15033588 0.45704202 0.09131745 0.22011301
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.2419295 0.6707053 0.9010046 0.7606475 0.7065915 0.1675546 0.1264722
#>  [8] 0.3695812 0.4082098 0.8446865

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.7989408 0.3292839 0.2759843 0.9919459 0.2972367
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.9314443 0.5429737 0.2133546 0.8046628 0.3911548
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.42665940 0.68588200 0.04264757 0.53779662 0.65046865
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.5318743 0.8986895 0.3166456 0.7884650 0.0567339

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.22820763 0.67620881 0.05474212 0.42982832 0.68359120
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5124432 0.2681973 0.6371133 0.1612916 0.6712173
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.48945413 0.54880971 0.51333997 0.08561197 0.97282111
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4656493 0.5542383 0.7501045 0.5159326 0.5923097

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.23762774 0.02087481 0.19651524 0.87016532 0.85567276
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.1352830 0.5298991 0.4707191 0.7317211 0.2852577
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.3608620 0.4416803 0.1522502 0.3512670 0.1112837
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.5805614 0.5495484 0.8853358 0.7684007 0.5989245

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.5         2.3          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 2          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2     setosa
#> 3          5.8         2.8          5.1         2.4  virginica
#> 4          4.6         3.2          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 5          6.2         2.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.1         2.8          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 2          6.7         3.0          5.2         2.3  virginica
#> 3          5.9         3.2          4.8         1.8 versicolor
#> 4          7.9         3.8          6.4         2.0  virginica
#> 5          5.0         3.3          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.2         2.8          4.8         1.8  virginica
#> 2          5.4         3.4          1.5         0.4     setosa
#> 3          6.6         3.0          4.4         1.4 versicolor
#> 4          5.2         3.4          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 5          5.1         2.5          3.0         1.1 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.7         3.3
#> 2           7.7         2.6
#> 3           6.5         3.0
#> 4           5.5         4.2
#> 5           4.9         3.0
#> 6           6.5         2.8
#> 7           5.8         2.8
#> 8           6.7         3.0
#> 9           4.3         3.0
#> 10          5.6         2.8
#> 11          5.7         3.0
#> 12          6.3         2.8
#> 13          6.6         2.9
#> 14          5.1         3.8
#> 15          5.7         2.6
#> 16          5.0         3.6
#> 17          4.6         3.2
#> 18          6.7         3.1
#> 19          5.2         4.1
#> 20          5.8         2.7

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.1         3.4
#> 2          5.6         2.7
#> 3          5.4         3.0
#> 4          6.9         3.1
#> 5          5.1         3.8
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.4         2.8
#> 2          5.5         2.4
#> 3          6.3         2.8
#> 4          5.6         2.9
#> 5          6.1         2.8
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.6         2.7
#> 2          6.9         3.1
#> 3          5.0         3.4
#> 4          6.6         2.9
#> 5          5.8         2.6
